definition: surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The world famous brand electrical control components to ensure long-term trouble-free operation of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 世界名牌电器控制元器件，确保机器长期无故障运行。

sentences.english: This article gives the design means and work principle for taping electronic component count apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了编带电子元器件点数仪的设计方法和工作原理。

sentences.english: TThe operational reliability of electronic components is the key and basis for the reliability of the entire equipment.
sentences.chinese: 元器件的使用可靠性是整机可靠性的关键和基础。

sentences.english: The latest development of chip components is presented.
sentences.chinese: 综述了片式元器件的最新发展动态。

sentences.english: The first step of recycling Printed Circuit Board in Physical method is unsoldering the electronic component.
sentences.chinese: 电路板的物理法回收首先要对电子元器件进行脱焊。

sentences.english: Study and select the new components of ESD protection.
sentences.chinese: 研究并选择有关静电保护的新元器件。

sentences.english: Electrostatic sensitive device. Observe precautions for handling.
sentences.chinese: 电子敏感元器件，拿起时注意防静电。

sentences.english: The Components developed for this system can be used to design new optical computing systems.
sentences.chinese: 研制成的各单元器件可用于其它各种光计算机系统中。

sentences.english: Development of Selective Leak Electricity Protection Device in High-voltage Power Network;
sentences.chinese: 研究并选择有关静电保护的新元器件。

sentences.english: E-Hout is a company specializing in sales of all brands in the world of electronic components.
sentences.chinese: 豪特电子是一家专业销售世界各品牌电子元器件。

sentences.english: Arrow Asia Pac is one of Asia-Pacific's leading electronic component distributors.
sentences.chinese: 艾睿电子是亚太地区领先的元器件分销商之一。

sentences.english: Know the function of electronic components and can understand electrical principle drawing.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉各电子元器件的功能及能够看懂电气原理图。

sentences.english: The concept of internal residual gas analysis of hermetic device was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍了密封元器件内部残余气氛分析的概念。

sentences.english: It’s the trip over for Electronica.
sentences.chinese: 那是关于参加电子元器件展会的事情。

sentences.english: Suitable for the continuous cleaning operations of the appliance, components, and the machinery parts.
sentences.chinese: 适合于器械，元器件，机械零部件的连续式清洗作业。

sentences.english: The technics of distilling silver from waste electronic device by two step electrolysis method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了两步电解法回收废电子元器件中银的工艺条件。
